content:
Romance in the Heart of Key West

 
Every night in Key West, awe-inspiring sunsets offer a magical setting for romance as gorgeous pink skies kiss perfect blue waters.  Palm trees sway, distant music floats through the warm ocean air, and delicious dining is around every corner.
 

The Marker Key West is ideal for honeymoons and other romantic escapes.  Our inspired accommodations feature spectacular views and private balconies, three secluded oasis pools, a poolside restaurant with the freshest local seafood, a relaxed pool bar and easy access to iconic beaches and attractions.  Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply seeking a couples getaway, let us make your stay a romantic escape to remember.
